tool_description: Yahu Finance is an API project available on Rapid API that provides real-time stock quotes, historical prices, financial statements, news articles, and more for thousands of companies worldwide. With multiple endpoints and query parameters, developers can easily integrate this user-friendly and well-documented API into their projects for trading applications, financial analytics tools, or to keep track of favorite companies.

api_list.name: stock split
api_list.description: This endpoint provides information about the stock split of a stock.

api_list.name: dividends
api_list.description: This endpoint provides information about the dividend of a stock.

api_list.name: get price custom date
api_list.description: This endpoint provides stock price information within a specified timeframe.

api_list.name: get price period
api_list.description: This endpoint provides stock price information in a period.

api_list.name: get shares
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the shares information about a stock.

api_list.name: get news
api_list.description: This endpoint provides news information about a stock.

api_list.name: get isin
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the ISIN information of a stock.

api_list.name: get summary
api_list.description: The 'summary' endpoint provides key information about recent market prices.

api_list.name: get detail info
api_list.description: This endpoint provides detailed information about a stock.

api_list.name: get info
api_list.description: This endpoint provides up-to-date data for a stock.

api_list.name: get insider transactions
api_list.description: This endpoint provides data on transactions made by insiders.

api_list.name: get statistics
api_list.description: This endpoint provides statistics data.

api_list.name: get key executives
api_list.description: This endpoint provides key executives data.

api_list.name: get product involvement areas
api_list.description: This endpoint provides product involvement areas data.

api_list.name: get analysis
api_list.description: This endpoint provides analysis data.

api_list.name: get historical data
api_list.description: This endpoint contains stock information for the last 100 days.

api_list.name: get insider roster
api_list.description: This endpoint provides insider roster data.

api_list.name: get esg data
api_list.description: This endpoint provides ESG data.

api_list.name: get holders
api_list.description: This endpoint contains shareholder information per category.

api_list.name: get options
api_list.description: This endpoint provides options data.

api_list.name: get financials
api_list.description: This endpoint provides data information about balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow.
